About Me

My name is Gurpreet Singh and I love writing code. Ever since writing my first program in "C" and manipulating it to produce the desired output, I have been obsessed with the idea of using code to solve practical problems. There's certainly yet more to learn, yet more problems to solve, and yet more to build and for this, I am very grateful.
